title: Fog is back.
body:
Hey guys, Fog here. 

Since the start of boards I have been posting under lols. Previously on the forums I posted under Fog. Over the last month or two I have taken a break from the Boards and now I am back and will begin posting under Fog again.

Now then, what has happened on the Boards in my last two months of absence?

Regards, 
Fog 
{{champion:34}}

replies.body:
%%%%posting is down unfortunatly, but Name and Shame/Rant threads are at an all time high.

95% of us old GDrs are absent if not dead.

And i can attest to Ranked being full of Ragers and Flamers atm.

I could show you but then i would be done for Name and Shame... FK it, no name and shame intended
http://i.imgur.com/G8M8brD.gif

Absolutely nothing



Boards are dead xd.
It would appear that way. I just see a sea of ranked provisional QQ threads and I want a fk, I mean ranked buddy.
